content.detailedDescription: Saw a floating object above some apartments across the way watched it move a bit than filmed it, i have the video on youtube the channel is "metalfacedreality".. watch how it moves enjoy.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object hovering over buildings moving fast than slow

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my son to school just coming off 208 and getting onto 287 just before 8 am when my son commented on a strange long straight black line in the sky. as we got closer we noticed many black objects that looked like balls. at first i thought they were geese but they weren't in a v formation. there were far too many to be geese. we then noticed many small lights within each black orb. they were coming from the south heading northwest. about 6 of them on the right side started going higher just a little. we lost track of them when we took the 202 exit.
content.summary: 30+ objects in a straight line then some moved up

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed what looked like the moon/venus except it had a greenish tint to it.
we continued to play basketball and several minutes later, we looked up and noticed that the object was larger. we laughed but continued playing ball.
the next time we looked up, it was a giant fireball, appearing to be right above us. i ran, climbed a tall fence, ran through a garden and up onto the porch of a house. when i looked up, it was gone. all 6  boys saw the same thing. i saw one of the boys ~20 years later and he immediately asked me if i remembered that event.
content.summary: 6 boys playing basketball at school playground, first noticed sphere that looked like the moon or venus, except it was greenish in color. we con

content.detailedDescription: On march 24 th around 2:45 am i was sitting at my kitchen table in my apartment after getting in from work ( i'm a cocktail waitress). i was on the phone with my boyfriend ( lives on west coast up bc of time difference ) when i notice 6 bright orange circular objects in the sky with white lights around them . after staring at the objects for a few seconds i told him i had to use my phone to tape what i was seeing bc i had no idea what was in the air . i then started to video record the event with my iphone out of my 12 th floor apt window . the aircrafts did not seem to make any noise infact it was extremely quiet out my window which is odd for my location . i stopped recording the objects bc i wanted to call my boyfriend back incase something bad was about to happen . the objects all stayed together heading in same direction made a slight directional change in unison. after about a minute or a little longer the lights on the objects went out two at a time . i sat back down at my table in disbelief and a bit frightened . about 15 minutes later 3 more appeared heading in same direction but this time i could see a helicopter in distance hovering as if they were watching the objects . i also saw a plane in distance this time . the three bright lights all went out at same time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Six bright orange objects with white lights traveling in a pack. they stopped and hovered then went on their way about 10 mins later another 3 appeared did same thing . the bright lights went out in twos first set the second set all went out at same time.

content.detailedDescription: On march 24 th around 2:45 am i was sitting at my kitchen table in my apartment after getting in from work ( i'm a cocktail waitress). i was on the phone with my boyfriend ( lives on west coast up bc of time difference ) when i notice 6 bright orange circular objects in the sky with white lights around them . after staring at the objects for a few seconds i told him i had to use my phone to tape what i was seeing bc i had no idea what was in the air . i then started to video record the event with my iphone out of my 12 th floor apt window . the aircrafts did not seem to make any noise infact it was extremely quiet out my window which is odd for my location . i stopped recording the objects bc i wanted to call my boyfriend back incase something bad was about to happen . the objects all stayed together heading in same direction made a slight directional change in unison. after about a minute or a little longer the lights on the objects went out two at a time . i sat back down at my table in disbelief and a bit frightened . about 15 minutes later 3 more appeared heading in same direction but this time i could see a helicopter in distance hovering as if they were watching the objects . i also saw a plane in distance this time . the three bright lights all went out at same time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Six bright orange objects with white lights traveling in a pack. they stopped and hovered then went on their way about 10 mins later another 3 appeared did same thing . the bright lights went out in twos first set the second set all went out at same time.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my fiance were on our patio in margate facing west toward everglades when she saw the lights. i began to look and saw star like light in the sky, there were about three all dancing around each other flying up and across the sky. they would change direction instantly and then speed up and shoot across the sky. they were all over the sky almost like a swarm of locus but lights. they would shoot off up into space and then we would see more. if you looked at the horizon west, there were many of these lights which would then rise into the sky dance around and shoot up into space. the night was a full moon, the clouds were so thick and pink, that if they crossed under the moon it would block the moon out completely. the clouds also seemed like they were hiding these crafts. the ufos would come out of these clouds and go back in. it seemed like they almost had the ability to control the clouds, splitting them and then making them come back together. a group of these ufos would also come together and then the light would disappear but you could still see an invisible, cloak like look which was in a triangle type shape which would distort the sky and it would then take off. we were so amazed by this we started to call everyone we knew to look. every person saw the same thing we did! they were amazed. the whole thing lasted like 3 hours. we decided to drive closer around 12:15 to the everglades to see if we could get a better look. when we arrived, my fiance pointed out which looked like a plane and said "there it is look". it was traveling from east to west, maybe about 1mi up. i thought it was a plane but she told me to keep watching it. it was going pretty fast, then all of the sudden it stopped in mid air. it had a red/orange glow. it hovered almost right above us for about 15 seconds when it took off straight up into space! the most amazing thing i have ever seen in my life. we have at least 5 other people in different locations throughout  the city who saw the same thing.
i tried to take pictures and video with my iphone and nikon, but the clouds and lights were too thick and the light was too dim for the camera to pick it up. i hope someone else got it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hundreds of lights dancing around the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to dinner with my girlfriend when i looked out the window of her car. i first noticed these lights and thought it was just the big dipper. as i kept looking i realized they were too big of lights to be that. i kept my eye on them and pulled over in a place clear from trees it was at that time i realized there was about 8-12 big orbs in a single line equally distant. my girlfriend and i were shocked seeing these mysterious lights i took out my phone and attempted to record the phenomenon but the orbs wouldn't appear on my screen. so i pressed the home button and looked back up and almost all of them suddenly disappeared. for another 3 minutes i watched the last of them dissolve into the sky. i noticed after the first group of them dissapeared there was a plane there. it was very strange but also very cool i contemplated with my girlfriend saying maybe the government is testing new ships but it seemed to be bizzare for them to have that many in a line equally distant. also we considered the meteor shower that happened this week but we ruled that out pretty quick considering the objects were moving up. this sighting opened me up to the thought what else is here on earth with us
content.summary: 8-10 red orange orbs in single line equal distant

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter called me from a baseball field to tell me that her and her friend had been watching these reddish orange lights hover and fly over them. they made no noise and pulsed. they traveled in different directions and hovered in the wind. i came to pick her up at her friend's house after talking to her and we saw another one. 
these craft have been very frequently sighted in our town by many people.
content.summary: My daughter called me at 8:30pm to tell me that she and her friend had been watching a reddish orange light hovering in the sky. we both have seen these lights in our town together and separately.  i came to pick her up and saw another one myself .

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to my bowling league one night in the late 1970's or early 1980's. i believe it was wintertime, but not positive. as i turned right (north) onto spaulding road near kettering, oh, i noticed a formation of 5 to 7 white lights off to my 10 o'clock position. the lights puzzled me, as they were in a chevron looking formation, and not moving. at first i thought i may be seeing reflections from behind my car, but noticing nothing behind me, i rolled down my driver's window and the lights were still there in the distance, and just hovering. at the time of my sighting, the road on which i traveled was in a bare state-run farm field. my view was unobstructed for about a mile. i slowed down to about 15 mph and continued to view the lights for about 3 minutes until my view was obstructed by trees and residencial development. the lights were about 40-45 degrees elevation from ground level and appeared to be more than a mile from me. the overall size was enormous, but i couldn't determine the distance from me as it was dark outside. they appeared to be at least a mile away and possibly 2 miles. i never reported the sighting figuring that it had to have been seen my hundreds, and i therefore didn't need to report it. i wish now that i reported it then, as my recollection as to the date it happened and exact number of lights fail me. i have included two maps to show you where i was at the time, and the direction in which i saw the lights. upon seeing the phoenix lights of 1997 on a tv program, i could swear that i was viewing exactly what i saw in the dayton area, in relative size, elevation, and approximate distance. i have enclosed 2 maps showing the location and destination where the sighting occurred. i would like to know if this occurance was reported, and if so, what it was that i saw. i am an air force veteran, and at the time of the sighting, i knew of nothing that the military had in its inventory that would have explained what i saw.
content.summary: I witnessed 5 to 7 lights (in a chevron formation) hovering over northeast dayton, oh in the late 1970's or early 1980's.

content.detailedDescription:
We live in seattle  on queen anne hill,  north of the space needle. sea tac int. airport is close so we see planes all the time. my girlfriend hadjust gone to bed and i ssat down to watch something on netflix. 

out the southern window i saw these two bright red lights through the leafless tree outside our building coming our direction. there was a low cloud cover and they didn't look "right" looked like red road flares but not on the road. i thought they might be planes but they really didn't look like planes. too brilliant and just red with a whitish center. 

i called to my girlfriend to come take a look. she did and told me she thought it was strangethat they were flying in a wobbly line. she knew i was a fan of funny things in the sky so it wasn't a shock to her when i had my phone, a flashlight and my shoes on by the time she turned from the window. 

i shot down 3 flights of stairs and out onto the street. i ran to where i could see them and didn't have a street light blinding me. i began to film after i wiped my phone's camera lens. i didn't want to be "that guy" 

i began to loose track of the lead object when i saw another making 3. i filmed them for a few moments and a jet came from around a building, climbing.  it must have seen them. it passed so close. i'm guessing this based off the cloud cover it and they seemed to be under. the plane ascending into the clouds infront of the objects and out of sight within frame of the camera. it could be heard clearly but the objects remained visable and still moving north. 

they began to get lost in the clouds and i stopped filming. i lost sight of them moments later.  the end...?
content.summary: Redish brilliant lights, 3 flying in a line. plane passed scary close, on video.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside looking up and noticed 4 lights, 3 in a straight line and one travelling beside the 3, moving at an fast rate, when the one single light switched sides and continues flying south until fading out.
content.summary: 4 lights traveling in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: Observed 3 silver reflective orbs in a close revolving triangle formation passing overhead in a northwest direction at about 50mph, then stopped, hovered for about 5 mins, and then continued course. while hovering, ufo's switched between triangle formations to vertical and horizontal straight line formations.
content.summary: Three silver orbs (ufo's) mainly in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
Date: 130315
time: ~0421
duration: 1 minute
location: offshore, hamakua coast off honomu, hawaii island, hi 96720
range: about 3 ��� 5 km
weather:
cloudy, no precipitation within at least an hour b4 and after 
t = ~18 c. humidity ~75%
wind: calm, sight variable breeze
sea: no warnings issued. sea surface not discernable
no moon
 
observer: redacted
state of consciousness: alert, awake for several hours
 
while standing on the lanai looking eastward out to sea, he sighted an object, resembling a cruise ship, firstly with one row of lights and one solid, one changing light quite above. while focusing on anomaly the row of lights were oscillating, another row of lights appeared under the existing row for approx 25 or 30 seconds, then went out. the object was observed for about 45-55 sec. the observer was alerted when the lights wavered. an additional row illuminated and then shut off, the lights shimmered and wavered, and then the object slid rapidly out of view behind the sugarcane. the observer became excited, and began searching for a video camera, hesitated to awaken his wife, did not rouse her but found the camera. he returned to the lanai and stood on the railing to attempt to see the object again.

note: mufon report forms do not handle sea-based sightings well, nor account for speed changes without course change.
content.summary: Object resembling a cruise ship w/ two rows of lights that wavered, blinked, and shimmered. anomalous motion.

content.detailedDescription:
The slipper ship of hamakua

date: 130314
time: ~1933 ��� 1936
duration: 3-5 minutes
location: offshore, hamakua coast off umauma gulch, hawaii island, hi 96710
range: about 2 ��� 4 km
weather:
cloudy, no precipitation within at least an hour b4 and after 
t = 21.2 c. humidity ~75%
wind: calm, sight variable breeze
sea: no warnings issued
no moon

observer: redacted
state of consciousness: alert, clear- headed, balanced, awake for several hours, rested and fed.

sitting inside my home with a panoramic view of the night sea, i finished watching video, and then i looked up and noticed two objects that appeared like the cruise ships that periodically travel north and south along the hamakua coast of the big island of hawaii. this is the first time i���ve spotted two cruise ships at once. as usual, i immediately shut off the lights and began to watch. when the ships pass by in the night, the deck lights are beautiful. i stood by a large picture windows and opened it, looking thru the screen, smelling the warm hawaiian night air, and listening for the sound of the ship engines, which are usually audible, but not in this case. as i waited for my eyes to adjust, usually 5- 7 min, i felt regret as i determined that the northern most ship was heading north, and would soon be obscured by the eucalyptus trees that framed my 120 degree sea view to the north. (my left.) the other ship was closer and near the southern end of my sea view. (my right.) i assumed it was moving southward, and that the two ships had already passed in the night. i focused my attention on the left ship, which had more lights than the ship on the right. it gradually moved, northward, taking about 30 sec to its move behind the trees, its lights twinkling thru them for a bit. this was a familiar sight, having watched many cruise ships pass at night during the preceding 5 months. i shifted my attention to the ship on the right, and noted that it was indeed moving very slowly southward, already partially obscured by the bamboo stand that marks the rightmost limit of the sea panorama.
i had been observing for about two minutes by this time. 
as i gazed directly at the remaining ship, i thought of the days��� events, associated memories, etc, and the beauty of the cruise ships.
without warning, no noise or other change in the environment, i observed the ship suddenly slide out of site just behind the bamboo stand, stopping with its lights twinkling thru the bamboo. this took about ��� of a second. i snapped to intent alertness, and moved to another window in hope to regain a clear view or the object. no luck. twinkling thru the bamboo,the object resumed its cruise-ship-like slow, even progress to the south. during the next 20 seconds, i performed several internal and external process checks to determine that i was awake, alert, sane, and that my time sense and physical body were intact and normally operating. i expected to find dizziness, fatigue or dream like feelings, instead, i remained a high-functioning observer. my heart rate increased as i began to collect and record environmental data. i had a distinct impression that the object had dodged behind the bushes to hide from me. also wanted to hop in the car and chase it, but i did not. 

for the rest of the evening i frequently looked in that direction, and had a difficult time accepting the mystery. the next day i immediately was drawn to gaze at that spot upon awakening.

finding this an amazing and durable memory, i mentioned it to a friend that day, thus eliciting a separate sighting of a similar object from him. report of his sighting follows.

note- mufon report forms do not handle sea based sightings very well, and do not include speed changes without course change.
content.summary: Anomalous speed changes of object resembling a cruise ship's lights apparently on sea or between observer and sea at night

content.detailedDescription:
Left work shortly after 2pm sunday, 3/24 going home to granbury,tx. from stephenville. i take the back roads instead of hiway 377, the commonly used route because of heavy traffic on 377, for safety reasons. i was on cr305 close to the erath/hood county line. a very rural area and sparsely populated. almost no traffic. about 1420hrs a very bright silver light to the south caught my eye. it appeared round but was so bright it was hard to tell. i appeared to be about a mile away, at 5000' above ground, stationary. i stopped my car and watched it for about one minute then it shot away almost directly away from me to the south so i lost sight in less than a second. i have been a licensed pilot for 45 years and this was no known aircraft. this was a sunny clear day so the  brightmess was really remarkable. i do not believe it was a reflection, again because of the level of brightness so that the light appeared to be eminating fron the object. i was very interested and curious, i was not frightened. 
/
content.summary: Bright silver lightl stationary then left to the s directly away from me at high rate of speed. pilot 45yrs, no airccraft

content.detailedDescription: Please dont discount date of 4th of july. on that night the kids saw a bright orb cross the night sky. after hearing them ruckus about it again, i pulled my camera to capture the second one. tenty minute's after the first cross the entire night sky from west to eadt over kalama washington. it happened 3 more times. many families and two generations of military dads witnessed all accounts. the audio and video speak for themselves.
content.summary: We saw 4 accounts of bright orb  3 on video

content.detailedDescription: I was westbound on hwy 14 at 1:30ish am, returning home after working on my sisters mobile home.  the only other car on the road ahead slowed and pulled over to the side of the road.  i slowed and stopped thinking he needed help.  i saw him looking to the south, over the river.  when i looked over to the river, i saw the ufo, eastbound and slowly descending, with two very large yellow lights on the underside shining straight down.  the lights were illuminating a lumber yard on the bank of the river. it was roughly rectangular with the front edge rounded.  the ufo descended to about 500 feet and then leveled out.  it continued moving easterly until it was about roughly perpendicular to me and the highway.  i got a good long look at the ufo during this time.  it was pretty large and very clear.  it was easily larger than several 747 aircraft placed wing to wing.  it had two very large yellow lights on the underside at each end.  the lights were about 8 feet in diameter and emitted a yellowish light.  i could not see objects behind (through) the light beams.  it was like they were opaque.  the ufo itself was flat black in color.  there were no other lights, portholes or features that could be seen.  i listened carefully for any sounds the ufo might be making, but it was silent.  i even turned my car's engine off to hear better.  i estimated it's speed at about 35 mph and very constant.  then a kind of spooky thing happened.  the ufo shut off the two big yellow lights and and began a slow ascent.  i had the feeling like the thing had spotted us watching it and decided to leave.  when the ufo started its ascent it didn't pitch up like an aircraft would have done.  it remained quite level and simply started ascending while traveling to the east.  it continued climbing at about a 45 degree angle until it reached the overcast and slowly disappeared as it entered the clouds.  the other guy on the road ahead of me watched the whole event.  as soon as the ufo went into the clouds, he started his car and took off towards vancouver.  i wanted to go talk to him to see if he saw what i saw, but had no chance since he left so quickly.
content.summary: Observed ufo over columbia river.  yellow lights shining on lumber yard below it.  traveled slowly easterly.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my kids to their mother's heading north up interstate 45 entering clear lake/webster area. i began to notice helicopters and airplanes in the sky which did not do more than barely get me to look up and watch them. i noticed multiple bright star-like objects far above them underneath the overcast sky, flying in slow swooping or curving tracks seeming to float further up into the sky. i was excited and started to look for more and noticed a larger and brighter star-object on the horizon floating downward slowly towards the tree line. i had no clue what these things were, they looked like stars. they were maybe a mile away, maybe more. but the light beams from them would pierce through the black sky much like a star's light would, and also had an iridescent twinkle to them. they looked just like stars. i focused on the larger one because i was excited to witness this and did not want to miss any more of what ever was going on. i felt an exciting tingle all the way to my finger-tips. i was incredibly intrigued and hollered to my kids to look but they would not stir from their sleep. which was odd, i also oddly gave up quickly trying to wake them. i began to video tape the objects. i video taped the larger object mostly and i think i saw it absorb another smaller one that seemed to come from the ground behind the tree-line. they object was to my left eventually almost below the trees, where i think it landed, and i could not track it and drive at the same time anymore. i have a couple grainy videos that i took with my crappy phone that i would love to give copies of, if they provide any help whatsoever.
content.summary: Saw increased aerial activity while driving on highway, started noticing multiple ufo's behaving differently.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 5 others were waiting outside rapid transit station, waiting for a shuttle for a casino. looked up and spotted object. the object was soundless and had no defining features. no other lights seen, just a burning orb. appeared to ascend to the cloud-line and then moved slowly north. at this time, another had appeared in the spot of the original and hovered, then slowly ascended through the cloud cover and seemed to dissolve. myself and one other were fascinated; the rest of our party paid little attention. these objects appeared to be directly above us, but there was no fear, only curiosity. myself and the other witness had seen something similar about 1 year prior. oddly, we witnessed the same type of orb above the same area and airspace, at about the same time of night but from 5 km north. at that time, the object we saw seemed to fizzle out as it moved to the east.
content.summary: Glowing, as if on fire. yellowish-orange. appeared and then ascended.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my girlfriend lay on the ground to see if we could spot a shooting star to make a wish (silly but we live in london and you do not get to see a clear sky in london). when i was looking into the clear night sky i saw 3 objects going across the sky changing thier speed dramatically in line across the sky, you could tell it was around the edge of the sky into space it took about 3 seconds (plenty of time for me to see clear they were moving in ways onlys exceleration could possible make objects move in this way )to cross the sky, the main issue, i have is they were definately a craft, i just do not think man kind has developed an aircraft to hit these speeds 
please can you inform me if an craft man kind has desinged could go clear across the night sky directly above in 3 seconds at extreme hights?
i felt i need to find out if a aircraft could possible do this in space that man has made
they just carried on and went off towards space i could not see it anymore
content.summary: 3 starlight objects going a a straight line changing thier speed individually keeping in line, arcoss the whole sky in about 4 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving ne on highway 90/94 outbound from chicago around 7:30 pm.  the highway was full of cars and up ahead we noticed what appeared to be a balloon floating over the highway.  it was solid black and didn't have a single light on it and there was a plane in the air behind it, which made it stand out even more to me.  we watched it slowly decend and hover right above a car in the left hand lane, farther up the highway, we completely expected it to get blown back up in the air by the wind of the passing cars, but it didn't.  it didn't flutter or spin or anything like a balloon, it just hovered and appeared to be motionless.  we then observed it move above the adjacent car on the right and proceed to rise and ascend back into the air in straight line, nothing like a balloon in the wind.   it didn't register to us what we were looking at untill we drove right underneath it and had a chance to observe it from about 15ft away.  it wasn't any type of balloon i have ever seen and it wasn't made of a material that i recognized.  maybe it could have been a dark plastic or dark metal, but i couldn't tell.  i experienced a brief moment of second guessing myself untill my girlfriend with a very frightened look in her eye yelled "what was that?!"     we then both realised we just witnessed something very very strange. 

this whole experience happened within a few minutes and it has left us confused and concerned.  mostly because it was a distraction and came dangerously close to cars traveling over 60 mph.  if this was a type of drone it was being operated in very dangerous manner and if it's something else, well i don't know what to say.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Solid black flying and hovering sphere/orb over highway 90/94 chicago

content.detailedDescription:
March 22, 2013 at 7:54 pm driving east on rt. 64 from charlottesville, va.  about 1,500 feet from exit 124 a radiant stream of blue light with some white in it flashed down at a 45 degree angle. only for a few seconds. it first appeared about 400 feet to the left of the car and was about 400 feet above the ground headed to the right. it disappeared at about 100 feet from the earth. my time is exact, the place on the highway close, the distance and hight of the ufo approximate.  

i assumed immediately that this was a ufo event because there was no sound, and especially in the manner that the light just suddenly and silently appeared and disappeared, and the light was like a photoshop creation for a television advertisement: by that i mean to say the light seemed hyper-real; it was so strongly colored! my wife was with me and saw it just as i did. the sky seemed relatively clear so i do not think that it appeared or disappeared behind clouds.   i am no mufon observer, but i have been a member of mufon for over ten years, and i was in the navy, and for a month or so worked in tracking fighter planes. but i am no expert in this.

i don't know if this counts as an "oz" situation, but we had just come from a visit to an "energy intuitive" and she (name withheld) and for no cost gave us some of the most profound insights of our lives for personal growth.
content.summary: Radiant blue light suddenly and silently appears descends then disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were going for a walk, and she decided to sit in our driveway instead.So i got a chair off the front porch for her and then i got one,we were enjoying the sunshine on a cool day. i just happened to look up over her head and in the sky was the disk.I asked her to look at it just to make sure my eyes wearnt playing tricks on me.At first i thought it was a black buzzard at first and then looked closer, and noticed it wasn t moveing.That got her attention, so she looked and she saw it. so i told her to keep an eye on it as i went to get my binoculers 
, i got them with in 5 seconds and was looking at the disk,and she looked at it too.We watched it for about one minute and we noticed a few planes flying above it, and with out a trace it was gone.When i looked at the disk i could only see the bottom and it was a shinny brass color on the bottom,from ware we were on the ground level it was about 70 % in the sky and it moved right over our heads at 90%and disappered just like that we lost it. i have see one once before in 1972 in my uncel s back yard in covington area with my cousin we were just kids, and just never talked about it, but it also was a silver disk,with naked eye, but with binockulers i saw the brass bottom.
,
content.summary: Saucer like flight was lower then jet flight s  because it wasbetween us and a jet fumes above it, looked at it with binockulures, me and my wife both seen this.

content.detailedDescription: I am a past member of the astronomical society of canada, and live under the flight path between detroit mi and toronto canada. we are avid satellite watches and i have plaques dating back to 1992 documenting the nuber of satellites we observe. on this night i saw two lights at zeneth above my head at what i would have guessed at about 150to 200 thousand feet. i have seen two satellites before with the same trajectroy. however as i watched additional lights appeared. seven in all . a commercial jet went under this at about 35 to 40 thousound feet, probobly heading for europe as it lined up with the jet streem. this object i abserved appeared tobe 3 to 4 times higher. then i realized that this object, at this hight had tobe very large, with no sound. satellite watching has made me aware of the speed of certain objects. this was traveliing at twice the speed of the international space station @7.7klm/s
content.summary: 7 very unusal lights, heading nnw, at high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling southbound turnpike at around hollywood blvd, broward county, noticed rectangular object moving se towards ocean. first object passed. while driving at 60 miles per hour used iphone 5 to snap two pictures by aiming in direction of objects. could not look through sight. just aimed camera and hoped for the best. objects looked rectangular with squares visible like the microsoft logo.
content.summary: Two rectangular objects moving se of the florida turnpike at hollywood

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving on the i-78 in san marcos, ca
2. wife spotted it since it was flying very strangely
3. thought maybe it was some kind of model, someone trying to hoax a ufo but i don't know of any models that could go that fast to cover the distance we observed.
4. object's entire surface glowed, pulsing from red to blue. no individual lights - the whole object glowed. it moved fluidly, without any pattern. it would sometimes suddenly drop and come to a quick stop then change direction suddenly or ascend and continue.
5. skeptic but perplexed on what it could possibly be
6. it kept dipping below the building/tree line and we'd lose it sight of it for a few minutes. then we'd see it again up in the sky. after one dip below the treeline and we lost it again. we didn't see it again for a while and it was getting late so we continued on our way home.
content.summary: Or- like object, entire object pulsed red to blue. "danced" around the sky very quickly making turns no reg aircraft could. it would suddenly drop then ascend and go all over cloud level to at least tree level. completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: Had parked on winters run rd. facing n looking at winters run river with a girl in order to make out.  while tking i was looking east and saw something inthe sky emiting sparks trailing a craft i thought to be an airplane in trouble.  it was moving what would appear to be slow, but at it's hight and distance would and did look like a jet.  when it got in front of us i could see no wings and thought the sparks looked like a childs sparklers on the 4th of july.  i watched it for a few minutes as it disapeart in the western sky;  at no time did this craft change from it's flight path.  i would guess it took 5 minutes to go from e to w.  i would guess it was 3 miles out and 3000 ft up.
content.summary: Obserfed a craft i believed to be an airplane moving e to w trailing sparks behind it

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: J'���tais dans la cuisine pour nourrir le chat. quand, j'ai entendu un bruit puissant d���avion venir de la hotte de cuisine. curieuse, je suis aller voir ��� l'ext���rieur. j'ai alors vu un immense h���licopt���re noir, sans insigne et num���ro,  volant a basse altitude. environ 1000pi je pouvais clairement voir les machines etc... je suis rest��� l���, en me demandant qu'est-ce c'���tait. quand 10 secondes plus tard, j'ai vu, a 3500pi, un immense ufo d'au moins 200m et roulant ��� une vitesse d'au moins ��� 1 200km/h. des avions j'en ai vu... je suis pr���s de l���a���roport. donc je connais les grandeurs, distances etc.... mais ���a, c'���tait plat long et brillant....
content.summary: Cylinfre brillant passant a grande vitesse précéder d'un hélicoptère noir sans insigne.+

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside backyard with my son and his friend. around 9 pm saturday the 23rd of march. my son was starting a small bon fire.The sky was clear as a bell. small misty cloud to the south. 

i sat down facing the east and above my house there was a bright red orange somewhat yellow fireball shaped object. it seemed to just be still.  i thought it was a plane at first but it didnt really move. there was no sound.  i understand an object coming toward you may appear to be standing still.  i watched it for a few minutes. it was large compared to the stars that were out.  very bright.

 in my backyard we have quite the view of sky.  i looked down at the fire for just a couple minutes  less then 5 minutes and looked back and it was like it disappeared into thin air.  i looked all around in sky especially to the west and found nothing moving, no lights moving.  nothing but the still air and stars.   i couldnt stop thinking about it the rest of the night. i recalled a fellow stating two weeks ago described something similar he saw over bellingham bay and how quickly it moved with no sound.
content.summary: Bright fireball like  object  sighted over house, no sound,,quickly disappears.

content.summary: Lueurs devant ma fenãªtre
